page.title: 16LEISURE TIME FOR 9 YR OLDS
page.content: We did a survey of our class's leisure time.The most common sport is {cycling}and some go to{BMX club}. Many of us go to{swimming clubs}. {Rollerskating}was most popular with girls.Half our class like{dancing}.3/4 of the boys play{soccer}for a team . 6 boys are in a{judo club}.Other {sports}are done regularly by some children.{Computer}and{electronic {games}are the most common indoor games and{playing cards}is also popular. 10 people play{board games}. 9 girls are Brownies and 4 boys are{Cubs}. We all watch many hours of{television}each week. Favourite programmes are{Tom and {Jerry}(cartoon ) and an American police programme{Hardcastle and {McCormick}. Many of us have a variety of{collections}. The most common collections are rubbers,badges and stickers.
